text: يَـٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ

translation.en: O People of the Scripture, why do you disbelieve in the verses of Allah while you witness [to their truth]
translation.id: (Wahai Ahli Kitab! Mengapa kamu mengingkari ayat-ayat Allah,126) padahal kamu mengetahui (kebenarannya)
